posts.post_content:
I'm putting this beauty up for sale.  Pop reports indicate there's a mere 2
other PSA 5s in circulation.  I'm by no means going to give it away, but if
you'd like to make an offer, shoot me a PM.

As reference only, vcp.com and cardtarget.com the last 3 PSA 5 Polar Bear
Speakers have sold for $1500 (2013), $1323 (2012), $1050 (2008).

Thanks for looking,

ErikV
